content: **this ball measures a little more than 3 inches when completed perfect for the kitties that prefer bigger toys ** **you will need…** chosen yarn color for ball fiberfill stuffing catnip optional yarn needle to weave in ends size d 3 25mm or desired crochet hook stitch markers **stitches and abbreviations used…** chain - chain sl - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet st - stitch sts - stitches repeat - repeat increase - increase 2 single_crochet in the same space decrease - decrease or decrease single_crochet 2 together
